name: Summer
description: Lazy Summer Protocol offers automated exposure to DeFi's highest quality yield, continually rebalanced by AI powered keepers to earn the best available rates within set risk caps, while saving time and gas costs for users. Available on Ethereum, Base and Arbitrum, the protocol allows users to easily deposit into an selection of Vaults, including ETH, USDC and USDT, and get access to yields from multiple, top tier lending and staking protocols including Aave, Compound, Euler, Fluid, Gearbox, Morpho, Sky and Spark. Supported protocol rewards are automatically harvested by the keepers and sold for the underlying Vault token, adding to the Vault APR.
